summary: I BOUGHT THIS CAR USED. THE PREVIOUS OWNER SAID THAT THIS PROBLEM HAPPENED RIGHT AFTER SHE BOUGHT IT. DRIVER'S SIDE DOOR WON'T LOCK, AND IS DIFFICULT TO OPEN. IT WON'T OPEN USING THE LONG DOOR LATCH, I HAVE TO USE THAT TINY LATCH ABOVE IT. AND IT WON'T LOCK, EVEN WITH THE REMOTE LOCK BUTTON EITHER. MY CAR IS COMPLETELY OPEN TO THE PUBLIC AT ALL TIMES.   *TR
